amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to prescribe and apply criteria for operationally realistic testing of fieldable prototypes developed under the ballistic missile defense spiral development program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3453 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 125.

action.text: Amendment SA 3453 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3354. (consideration: CR S6928-6941; text: CR S6928) To require the Secretary of Defense to prescribe and apply criteria for operationally realistic testing of fieldable prototypes developed under the ballistic missile defense spiral development program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3453 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 125.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3453 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3354.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3453 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 125.
